verses.roman:
tina dina rahi' sei gopāla-cāpāla
sarvāṅge ha-ila kuṣṭha, vahe rakta-dhāra

synonyms: tina dina—three days; rahi'-remaining in that way; sei—that; gopāla-cāpāla—of the name Gopāla Cāpāla; sarva-aṅge—all over the body; ha-ila—became visible; kuṣṭha—leprosy; vahe—discharging; rakta-dhāra—a flow of blood.
translation: After three days, leprosy attacked Gopāla Cāpāla, and blood oozed from sores all over his body.
